com.google.earth.search.api
Class SearchRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.google.earth.search.api.SearchRequest

public class SearchRequest
extends java.lang.Object

A SearchRequest is the object that encapsulates the parameters from search requests issued by supported interfaces.

SearchRequest

public SearchRequest(java.lang.String service,
                     boolean setLookAtToFirstElement,
                     java.lang.String displayKeys)
Default class constructor that creates a SearchRequest using the supplied parameters

Parameters:
service - Service that is meant to execute the search request
setLookAtToFirstElement - Whether the interface should fly to the first element in the result set
displayKeys - Search keys used to name the top-level search result folder
